amendment.description: To extend the authority to operate the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

vote.text: Amendment SA 126 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 126 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1433) To extend the authority to operate the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 126 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 126 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bingaman.
